title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 409/90 of 16 February 1990 amending Regulation (EEC) No 584/75 laying down detailed rules for the application of the system of tendering for export refunds on rice
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 409/90
of 16 February 1990
amending Regulation (EEC) No 584/75 laying down detailed rules for the application of the system of tendering for export refunds on rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The second-to-last sentence of Article 1 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 584/75 is hereby replaced by the following:
'Between publication of the invitation to tender and the first date fixed for submission of tenders, a period of at least 10 days must be allowed.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 February 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
